model_results.active_learning: Ich habe die Antworten neu sortiert: Von jetzt an werde ich dir zuerst jene zeigen, bei denen ich mir nicht besonders sicher bin. Das sollte dir helfen fr√ºher mit dem Kodieren aufh√∂ren zu k√∂nnen.

model_results.lower60: Die Resultate sind ein guter Anfang, aber ich brauche noch etwas mehr Hilfe von dir!
model_results.lower70: Die Resultate sehen nicht schlecht aus, es gibt aber noch Luft nach oben.

generator.applied: Das Codebuch wurde auf deine Frage angewendet. Bis die Vorhersagen f√ºr alle Nennungen eintreffen, kann es einige Minuten dauern. Du kannst nun das Codebuch verfeinern, sowie zur Feinjustierung des Modells mit der √úberpr√ºfung der Kodierung beginnen.

en.introduction: Hi {name}^500, I will help you through coding this survey by giving you tips and information.

reviewed.all: You have already reviewed all answers! Nice work üôå
reviewed.none: You haven't reviewed any answers yet.

model_results.active_learning: I have resorted the responses: From now on you will show you the ones I'm not too sure about myself first. This will enable you to hopefully stop coding earlier.
model_results.lower50: But I'm not very sure yet about them, help me help you better by coding some more.
model_results.lower60: The results are a good start, but I still need some more help from you!
model_results.lower70: The results are not bad but can still be further improved.
model_results.lower80: The results look pretty good overall already
model_results.lower90: The results look great overall. Depending on your project you can already stop coding.
model_results.higher90: The results look fantastic overall ü§©. You can probably stop coding now and let the rest be done by me automatically.
model_results.codes_bad_lower70: Notably for the codes {codesBad} I'm not too sure of myself yet.
model_results.codes_bad_lower80: , but for the codes {codesBad} there's still room for improvement.
codes_bad_higher80: , but for the codes {codesBad} there's still room for improvement. Try finding answers that should have these codes directly using the search.
, but for the codes {codesBad} I'm still not quite happy. Try finding answers that should have these codes directly using the search.

autocoder.fresh: This list-question can be coded fully automatically.
autocoder.generated: Auto-coding is completed. Either further review the other code or download your results! You can always restart the coding assistant by clicking the Auto-Coding button in the code editing tab.

generator.applied: The selected codebook has been applied to your question. It might take a few minutes until the suggestions for all the responses arrive. You can now refine the codebook and start reviewing the coding, to fine-tune the model on your data.

preds_state.not_enough_annotated: I will start making predictions for unreviewed answers once you annotated {ncodes} more answers.
preds_state.predicting_from_inherited: I am currently computing suggestions based on the survey {inherits_from_name}, this may take up to a couple of minutes.
preds_state.predicting: I am currently computing new code suggestions; this may take up to a couple of minutes.
preds_state.trained: For the rest I have made some suggestions.

new_preds: New code suggestions arrived! I've updated {nPredicted} answers.
I've updated the predictions for {nPredicted} answers.
Hot new code suggestions for {nPredicted} responses just got in.
Just received new suggestions for {nPredicted} answers.
For {nPredicted} answers I got new predictions, just updated them.

keyboard.ans_focus: Use keyboard shortcuts to navigate between answers: press enter when having the code selection menu open or `` otherwise.
keyboard.code_delete: Use keyboard shortcuts to remove codes: Select the code you want to remove using the `` keys and then press backspace / delete.
keyboard.code_select: Use keyboard shortcuts to select codes: Use the `` keys to select one of the assigned codes.
keyboard.code_add: Use keyboard shortcuts to assign codes: Search for a code by typing parts of its category and / or name, or use the `` keys and then press enter.
